insert into dbo.T_SAL_Txsqd(ID, FID, FBillNo, FStatus, FShenqingren, FSqrID, FYuanShenqingren, FYuanSqrID, FYewuxingming, FYewubumen, Fsqriqi, Fkehumingcheng, Fkehudaima, Fyewudaima, Flaifangriqi, Fdijicisongyang, Fxiangmuxinxi, Fshangcishenqingdanhao, Fkegongyanju, Fkouweishuliang, Fyangpinxuqiuriqi, Fyanjuleixing, Fpipeishichang, Ftiandu, Fliangdu, Fnianchoudu, Fkouweizhuangong, Fxianchangshiyou, Fyoujixinxi, Fzidaiyanju, Fhuishouyanju, Ffaresizhonglei, Ffaresizuzhi, Fyanyoucangrongliang, Fdaoyoumianzhonglei, Fnigudinghanliang, Fyoubeicaizhi, Fqiwangwanchengshijian, Fyangpinxuqiushuliang, Fyujiwanchengshijian, FVG, Fbeizhu, Ffenpeigenjinren, FCurSpBillNo, FTijiaoTime, FShenheTime, FFenpeiTime, FLastModifyBy, FLastModifyTime) values
(#{entity.id}, #{entity.fid}, #{entity.fbillno}, #{entity.fstatus}, #{entity.fshenqingren}, #{entity.fsqrid}, #{entity.fyuanshenqingren}, #{entity.fyuansqrid}, #{entity.fyewuxingming}, #{entity.fyewubumen}, #{entity.fsqriqi}, #{entity.fkehumingcheng}, #{entity.fkehudaima}, #{entity.fyewudaima}, #{entity.flaifangriqi}, #{entity.fdijicisongyang}, #{entity.fxiangmuxinxi}, #{entity.fshangcishenqingdanhao}, #{entity.fkegongyanju}, #{entity.fkouweishuliang}, #{entity.fyangpinxuqiuriqi}, #{entity.fyanjuleixing}, #{entity.fpipeishichang}, #{entity.ftiandu}, #{entity.fliangdu}, #{entity.fnianchoudu}, #{entity.fkouweizhuangong}, #{entity.fxianchangshiyou}, #{entity.fyoujixinxi}, #{entity.fzidaiyanju}, #{entity.fhuishouyanju}, #{entity.ffaresizhonglei}, #{entity.ffaresizuzhi}, #{entity.fyanyoucangrongliang}, #{entity.fdaoyoumianzhonglei}, #{entity.fnigudinghanliang}, #{entity.fyoubeicaizhi}, #{entity.fqiwangwanchengshijian}, #{entity.fyangpinxuqiushuliang}, #{entity.fyujiwanchengshijian}, #{entity.fvg}, #{entity.fbeizhu}, #{entity.ffenpeigenjinren}, #{entity.fcurspbillno}, #{entity.ftijiaotime}, #{entity.fshenhetime}, #{entity.ffenpeitime}, #{entity.flastmodifyby}, #{entity.flastmodifytime})

insert into dbo.T_SAL_Txsqd(ID, FID, FBillNo, FStatus, FShenqingren, FSqrID, FYuanShenqingren, FYuanSqrID, FYewuxingming, FYewubumen, Fsqriqi, Fkehumingcheng, Fkehudaima, Fyewudaima, Flaifangriqi, Fdijicisongyang, Fxiangmuxinxi, Fshangcishenqingdanhao, Fkegongyanju, Fkouweishuliang, Fyangpinxuqiuriqi, Fyanjuleixing, Fpipeishichang, Ftiandu, Fliangdu, Fnianchoudu, Fkouweizhuangong, Fxianchangshiyou, Fyoujixinxi, Fzidaiyanju, Fhuishouyanju, Ffaresizhonglei, Ffaresizuzhi, Fyanyoucangrongliang, Fdaoyoumianzhonglei, Fnigudinghanliang, Fyoubeicaizhi, Fqiwangwanchengshijian, Fyangpinxuqiushuliang, Fyujiwanchengshijian, FVG, Fbeizhu, Ffenpeigenjinren, FCurSpBillNo, FTijiaoTime, FShenheTime, FFenpeiTime, FLastModifyBy, FLastModifyTime) values
(#{entity.id}, #{entity.fid}, #{entity.fbillno}, #{entity.fstatus}, #{entity.fshenqingren}, #{entity.fsqrid}, #{entity.fyuanshenqingren}, #{entity.fyuansqrid}, #{entity.fyewuxingming}, #{entity.fyewubumen}, #{entity.fsqriqi}, #{entity.fkehumingcheng}, #{entity.fkehudaima}, #{entity.fyewudaima}, #{entity.flaifangriqi}, #{entity.fdijicisongyang}, #{entity.fxiangmuxinxi}, #{entity.fshangcishenqingdanhao}, #{entity.fkegongyanju}, #{entity.fkouweishuliang}, #{entity.fyangpinxuqiuriqi}, #{entity.fyanjuleixing}, #{entity.fpipeishichang}, #{entity.ftiandu}, #{entity.fliangdu}, #{entity.fnianchoudu}, #{entity.fkouweizhuangong}, #{entity.fxianchangshiyou}, #{entity.fyoujixinxi}, #{entity.fzidaiyanju}, #{entity.fhuishouyanju}, #{entity.ffaresizhonglei}, #{entity.ffaresizuzhi}, #{entity.fyanyoucangrongliang}, #{entity.fdaoyoumianzhonglei}, #{entity.fnigudinghanliang}, #{entity.fyoubeicaizhi}, #{entity.fqiwangwanchengshijian}, #{entity.fyangpinxuqiushuliang}, #{entity.fyujiwanchengshijian}, #{entity.fvg}, #{entity.fbeizhu}, #{entity.ffenpeigenjinren}, #{entity.fcurspbillno}, #{entity.ftijiaotime}, #{entity.fshenhetime}, #{entity.ffenpeitime}, #{entity.flastmodifyby}, #{entity.flastmodifytime})
